shows.Title: Suits

Seasons.Title: Paths of Glory
Seasons.Plot: After refusing to attack an enemy position, a general accuses the soldiers of cowardice and their commanding officer must defend them.

Seasons.Title: Rear Window
Seasons.Plot: A wheelchair-bound photographer spies on his neighbors from his apartment window and becomes convinced one of them has committed murder.

Seasons.Title: Sunset Blvd.
Seasons.Actors: William Holden,Gloria Swanson,Erich von Stroheim,Nancy Olson
Seasons.Plot: A screenwriter develops a dangerous relationship with a faded film star determined to make a triumphant return.

Seasons.Title: The Great Dictator
Seasons.Plot: Dictator Adenoid Hynkel tries to expand his empire while a poor Jewish barber tries to avoid persecution from Hynkel's regime.

April 6th, 1917. As a regiment assembles to wage war deep in enemy territory, two soldiers are assigned to race against time and deliver a message that will stop 1,600 men from walking straight into a deadly trap.

Seasons.Title: Tumbbad
Seasons.Plot: A mythological story about a goddess who created the entire universe. The plot revolves around the consequences when humans build a temple for her first-born.

Seasons.Title: Andhadhun
Seasons.Plot: A series of mysterious events change the life of a blind pianist, who must now report a crime that he should technically know nothing of.

Seasons.Title: Drishyam
Seasons.Plot: A man goes to extreme lengths to save his family from punishment after the family commits an accidental crime.

Seasons.Title: Incendies
Seasons.Plot: Twins journey to the Middle East to discover their family history and fulfill their mother's last wishes.

Seasons.Title: Miracle in cell NO.7
Seasons.Actors: Aras Bulut Iynemli,Nisa Sofiya Aksongur,Deniz Baysal,Celile Toyon Uysal
Seasons.Plot: A story of love between a mentally-ill father who was wrongly accused of murder and his lovely six years old daughter. The prison would be their home. Based on the 2013 Korean movie 7-beon-bang-ui seon-mul (2013).

Seasons.Title: Babam ve Oglum
Seasons.Plot: The family of a left-wing journalist is torn apart after the military coup of Turkey in 1980.

Seasons.Title: Inglourious Basterds
Seasons.Plot: In Nazi-occupied France during World War II, a plan to assassinate Nazi leaders by a group of Jewish U.S. soldiers coincides with a theatre owner's vengeful plans for the same.

Seasons.Title: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
Seasons.Actors: Jim Carrey,Kate Winslet,Tom Wilkinson,Gerry Robert Byrne
Seasons.Plot: When their relationship turns sour, a couple undergoes a medical procedure to have each other erased from their memories.

Seasons.Title: Amélie
Seasons.Plot: Amélie is an innocent and naive girl in Paris with her own sense of justice. She decides to help those around her and, along the way, discovers love.

Seasons.Title: The Shawshank Redemption
Seasons.Plot: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

Seasons.Title: The Godfather
Seasons.Plot: An organized crime dynasty's aging patriarch transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

Seasons.Title: The Dark Knight
Seasons.Plot: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.

Seasons.Title: The Godfather: Part II
Seasons.Actors: Al Pacino,Robert De Niro,Robert Duvall,Diane Keaton
Seasons.Plot: The early life and career of Vito Corleone in 1920s New York City is portrayed, while his son, Michael, expands and tightens his grip on the family crime syndicate.

Seasons.Title: 12 Angry Men
Seasons.Actors: Henry Fonda,Lee J. Cobb,Martin Balsam,John Fiedler
Seasons.Plot: A jury holdout attempts to prevent a miscarriage of justice by forcing his colleagues to reconsider the evidence.

Seasons.Title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
Seasons.Plot: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

Seasons.Title: Pulp Fiction
Seasons.Actors: John Travolta,Uma Thurman,Samuel L. Jackson,Bruce Willis
Seasons.Plot: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

Seasons.Title: Schindler's List
Seasons.Plot: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.

Seasons.Title: Inception
Seasons.Plot: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O.

shows.Plot: While running from a drug deal gone bad, Mike Ross, a brilliant young college-dropout, slips into a job interview with one of New York City's best legal closers, Harvey Specter. Tired of cookie-cutter law school grads, Harvey takes a gamble by hiring Mike on the spot after he recognizes his raw talent and photographic memory.

shows.Title: Game of Thrones

Seasons.Title: Seppuku
Seasons.Plot: When a ronin requesting seppuku at a feudal lord's palace is told of the brutal suicide of another ronin who previously visited, he reveals how their pasts are intertwined - and in doing so challenges the clan's integrity.

Seasons.Title: It's a Wonderful Life
Seasons.Plot: An angel is sent from Heaven to help a desperately frustrated businessman by showing him what life would have been like if he had never existed.

Seasons.Title: Joker
Seasons.Actors: Joaquin Phoenix,Robert De Niro,Zazie Beetz,Frances Conroy
Seasons.Plot: In Gotham City, mentally troubled comedian Arthur Fleck is disregarded and mistreated by society. He then embarks on a downward spiral of revolution and bloody crime. This path brings him face-to-face with his alter-ego: the Joker.

Seasons.Title: Whiplash
Seasons.Plot: A promising young drummer enrolls at a cut-throat music conservatory where his dreams of greatness are mentored by an instructor who will stop at nothing to realize a student's potential.

Seasons.Title: The Intouchables
Seasons.Plot: After he becomes a quadriplegic from a paragliding accident, an aristocrat hires a young man from the projects to be his caregiver.

Seasons.Title: The Prestige
Seasons.Plot: After a tragic accident, two stage magicians engage in a battle to create the ultimate illusion while sacrificing everything they have to outwit each other.

Seasons.Title: The Departed
Seasons.Plot: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.

Seasons.Title: The Pianist
Seasons.Plot: A Polish Jewish musician struggles to survive the destruction of the Warsaw ghetto of World War II.

Seasons.Title: Gladiator
Seasons.Plot: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

Seasons.Title: American History X
Seasons.Plot: A former neo-nazi skinhead tries to prevent his younger brother from going down the same wrong path that he did.

Seasons.Title: The Usual Suspects
Seasons.Plot: A sole survivor tells of the twisty events leading up to a horrific gun battle on a boat, which began when five criminals met at a seemingly random police lineup.

Seasons.Title: Léon
Seasons.Plot: Mathilda, a 12-year-old girl, is reluctantly taken in by Léon, a professional assassin, after her family is murdered. An unusual relationship forms as she becomes his protégée and learns the assassin's trade.

Seasons.Title: The Lion King
Seasons.Actors: Rob Minkoff,Matthew Broderick,Jeremy Irons,James Earl Jones
Seasons.Plot: Lion prince Simba and his father are targeted by his bitter uncle, who wants to ascend the throne himself.

Seasons.Title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day
Seasons.Plot: A cyborg, identical to the one who failed to kill Sarah Connor, must now protect her teenage son, John Connor, from a more advanced and powerful cyborg.

Seasons.Title: Nuovo Cinema Paradiso
Seasons.Plot: A filmmaker recalls his childhood when falling in love with the pictures at the cinema of his home village and forms a deep friendship with the cinema's projectionist.

Seasons.Title: Hotaru no haka
Seasons.Plot: A young boy and his little sister struggle to survive in Japan during World War II.

Seasons.Title: Back to the Future
Seasons.Actors: Michael J. Fox,Christopher Lloyd,Lea Thompson,Crispin Glover
Seasons.Plot: Marty McFly, a 17-year-old high school student, is accidentally sent thirty years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his close friend, the eccentric scientist Doc Brown.

Seasons.Title: Psycho
Seasons.Plot: A Phoenix secretary embezzles $40,000 from her employer's client, goes on the run, and checks into a remote motel run by a young man under the domination of his mother.

Seasons.Title: Casablanca
Seasons.Plot: A cynical expatriate American cafe owner struggles to decide whether or not to help his former lover and her fugitive husband escape the Nazis in French Morocco.

Seasons.Title: Modern Times
Seasons.Plot: The Tramp struggles to live in modern industrial society with the help of a young homeless woman.

Seasons.Title: City Lights
Seasons.Plot: With the aid of a wealthy erratic tippler, a dewy-eyed tramp who has fallen in love with a sightless flower girl accumulates money to be able to help her medically.

Seasons.Title: Capharnaüm
Seasons.Actors: Zain Al Rafeea,Yordanos Shiferaw,Boluwatife Treasure Bankole,Kawsar Al Haddad
Seasons.Plot: While serving a five-year sentence for a violent crime, a 12-year-old boy sues his parents for neglect.

Seasons.Title: Ayla: The Daughter of War
Seasons.Plot: In 1950, amid-st the ravages of the Korean War, Sergeant Süleyman stumbles upon a half-frozen little girl, with no parents and no help in sight. Frantic, scared and on the verge of death, ...                See full summary »

Seasons.Title: Vikram Vedha
Seasons.Plot: Vikram, a no-nonsense police officer, accompanied by Simon, his partner, is on the hunt to capture Vedha, a smuggler and a murderer. Vedha tries to change Vikram's life, which leads to a conflict.

Seasons.Title: Kimi no na wa.
Seasons.Plot: Two strangers find themselves linked in a bizarre way. When a connection forms, will distance be the only thing to keep them apart?

Seasons.Title: Dangal
Seasons.Actors: Aamir Khan,Sakshi Tanwar,Fatima Sana Shaikh,Sanya Malhotra
Seasons.Plot: Former wrestler Mahavir Singh Phogat and his two wrestler daughters struggle towards glory at the Commonwealth Games in the face of societal oppression.

Seasons.Title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
Seasons.Plot: Teen Miles Morales becomes the Spider-Man of his universe, and must join with five spider-powered individuals from other dimensions to stop a threat for all realities.

Seasons.Title: Avengers: Endgame
Seasons.Actors: Joe Russo,Robert Downey Jr.,Chris Evans,Mark Ruffalo
Seasons.Plot: After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War (2018), the universe is in ruins. With the help of remaining allies, the Avengers assemble once more in order to reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance to the universe.

Seasons.Title: Avengers: Infinity War
Seasons.Actors: Joe Russo,Robert Downey Jr.,Chris Hemsworth,Mark Ruffalo
Seasons.Plot: The Avengers and their allies must be willing to sacrifice all in an attempt to defeat the powerful Thanos before his blitz of devastation and ruin puts an end to the universe.

Seasons.Title: Coco
Seasons.Actors: Adrian Molina,Anthony Gonzalez,Gael Garc�a Bernal,Benjamin Bratt
Seasons.Plot: Aspiring musician Miguel, confronted with his family's ancestral ban on music, enters the Land of the Dead to find his great-great-grandfather, a legendary singer.

Seasons.Title: Django Unchained
Seasons.Plot: With the help of a German bounty hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal Mississippi plantation owner.

shows.Plot: Seven noble families fight for control of the mythical land of Westeros. Friction between the houses leads to full-scale war. All while a very ancient evil awakens in the farthest north. Amidst the war, a neglected military order of misfits, the Night's Watch, is all that stands between the realms of men and icy horrors beyond.

shows.Title: Breaking Bad

Seasons.Title: Jodaeiye Nader az Simin
Seasons.Plot: A married couple are faced with a difficult decision - to improve the life of their child by moving to another country or to stay in Iran and look after a deteriorating parent who has Alzheimer's disease.

Seasons.Title: Incendies
Seasons.Plot: Twins journey to the Middle East to discover their family history and fulfill their mother's last wishes.

Seasons.Title: Miracle in cell NO.7
Seasons.Actors: Aras Bulut Iynemli,Nisa Sofiya Aksongur,Deniz Baysal,Celile Toyon Uysal

Seasons.Plot: When their relationship turns sour, a couple undergoes a medical procedure to have each other erased from their memories.

Seasons.Title: Amélie
Seasons.Plot: Amélie is an innocent and naive girl in Paris with her own sense of justice. She decides to help those around her and, along the way, discovers love.

Seasons.Title: Snatch
Seasons.Actors: Jason Statham,Brad Pitt,Benicio Del Toro,Dennis Farina
Seasons.Plot: Unscrupulous boxing promoters, violent bookmakers, a Russian gangster, incompetent amateur robbers and supposedly Jewish jewelers fight to track down a priceless stolen diamond.

Seasons.Title: Requiem for a Dream
Seasons.Plot: The drug-induced utopias of four Coney Island people are shattered when their addictions run deep.

Seasons.Title: American Beauty
Seasons.Plot: A sexually frustrated suburban father has a mid-life crisis after becoming infatuated with his daughter's best friend.

Seasons.Title: Good Will Hunting
Seasons.Plot: Will Hunting, a janitor at M.I.T., has a gift for mathematics, but needs help from a psychologist to find direction in his life.

Seasons.Title: Bacheha-Ye aseman
Seasons.Actors: Mohammad Amir Naji,Amir Farrokh Hashemian,Bahare Seddiqi,Nafise Jafar-Mohammadi
Seasons.Plot: After a boy loses his sister's pair of shoes, he goes on a series of adventures in order to find them. When he can't, he tries a new way to "win" a new pair.

Seasons.Title: Toy Story
Seasons.Plot: A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened and jealous when a new spaceman figure supplants him as top toy in a boy's room.

Seasons.Title: Braveheart
Seasons.Plot: Scottish warrior William Wallace leads his countrymen in a rebellion to free his homeland from the tyranny of King Edward I of England.

Seasons.Title: Reservoir Dogs
Seasons.Plot: When a simple jewelry heist goes horribly wrong, the surviving criminals begin to suspect that one of them is a police informant.

Seasons.Title: Full Metal Jacket
Seasons.Actors: Matthew Modine,R. Lee Ermey,Vincent D'Onofrio,Adam Baldwin
Seasons.Plot: A pragmatic U.S. Marine observes the dehumanizing effects the Vietnam War has on his fellow recruits from their brutal boot camp training to the bloody street fighting in Hue.

Seasons.Title: Idi i smotri
Seasons.Plot: After finding an old rifle, a young boy joins the Soviet resistance movement against ruthless German forces and experiences the horrors of World War II.

Seasons.Title: Aliens
Seasons.Plot: Fifty-seven years after surviving an apocalyptic attack aboard her space vessel by merciless space creatures, Officer Ripley awakens from hyper-sleep and tries to warn anyone who will listen about the predators.

Seasons.Title: Amadeus
Seasons.Actors: F. Murray Abraham,Tom Hulce,Elizabeth Berridge,Roy Dotrice
Seasons.Plot: The life, success and troubles of Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart, as told by Antonio Salieri, the contemporaneous composer who was insanely jealous of Mozart's talent and claimed to have murdered him.

Seasons.Title: Scarface
Seasons.Actors: Al Pacino,Michelle Pfeiffer,Steven Bauer,Mary Elizabeth Mastrantonio
Seasons.Plot: In 1980 Miami, a determined Cuban immigrant takes over a drug cartel and succumbs to greed.

Seasons.Title: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi
Seasons.Actors: Mark Hamill,Harrison Ford,Carrie Fisher,Billy Dee Williams
Seasons.Plot: After a daring mission to rescue Han Solo from Jabba the Hutt, the Rebels dispatch to Endor to destroy the second Death Star. Meanwhile, Luke struggles to help Darth Vader back from the dark side without falling into the Emperor's trap.

Seasons.Title: Das Boot
Seasons.Plot: The claustrophobic world of a WWII German U-boat; boredom, filth and sheer terror.

Seasons.Title: Taxi Driver
Seasons.Actors: Robert De Niro,Jodie Foster,Cybill Shepherd,Albert Brooks
Seasons.Plot: A mentally unstable veteran works as a nighttime taxi driver in New York City, where the perceived decadence and sleaze fuels his urge for violent action by attempting to liberate a presidential campaign worker and an underage prostitute.

Seasons.Title: The Sting
Seasons.Plot: Two grifters team up to pull off the ultimate con.

Seasons.Title: A Clockwork Orange
Seasons.Plot: In the future, a sadistic gang leader is imprisoned and volunteers for a conduct-aversion experiment, but it doesn't go as planned.

Seasons.Title: 2001: A Space Odyssey
Seasons.Plot: After discovering a mysterious artifact buried beneath the Lunar surface, mankind sets off on a quest to find its origins with help from intelligent supercomputer H.A.L. 9000.

Seasons.Title: Per qualche dollaro in più
Seasons.Actors: Clint Eastwood,Lee Van Cleef,Gian Maria Volont�,Mara Krupp
Seasons.Plot: Two bounty hunters with the same intentions team up to track down a Western outlaw.

Seasons.Title: Lawrence of Arabia
Seasons.Plot: The story of T.E. Lawrence, the English officer who successfully united and led the diverse, often warring, Arab tribes during World War I in order to fight the Turks.

Seasons.Title: The Apartment
Seasons.Plot: A man tries to rise in his company by letting its executives use his apartment for trysts, but complications and a romance of his own ensue.

Seasons.Title: North by Northwest
Seasons.Actors: Cary Grant,Eva Marie Saint,James Mason,Jessie Royce Landis
Seasons.Plot: A New York City advertising executive goes on the run after being mistaken for a government agent by a group of foreign spies.

Seasons.Title: Vertigo
Seasons.Actors: James Stewart,Kim Novak,Barbara Bel Geddes,Tom Helmore
Seasons.Plot: A former police detective juggles wrestling with his personal demons and becoming obsessed with a hauntingly beautiful woman.

Seasons.Title: Singin' in the Rain
Seasons.Plot: A silent film production company and cast make a difficult transition to sound.

Seasons.Title: Ikiru
Seasons.Plot: A bureaucrat tries to find a meaning in his life after he discovers he has terminal cancer.

Seasons.Title: Ladri di biciclette
Seasons.Plot: In post-war Italy, a working-class man's bicycle is stolen. He and his son set out to find it.

Seasons.Title: Double Indemnity
Seasons.Actors: Fred MacMurray,Barbara Stanwyck,Edward G. Robinson,Byron Barr
Seasons.Plot: An insurance representative lets himself be talked by a seductive housewife into a murder/insurance fraud scheme that arouses the suspicion of an insurance investigator.

shows.Plot: Walter White, a New Mexico chemistry teacher, is diagnosed with Stage III cancer and given a prognosis of only two years left to live. He becomes filled with a sense of fearlessness and an unrelenting desire to secure his family's financial future at any cost as he enters the dangerous world of drugs and crime.

Seasons.Title: Kimi no na wa.
Seasons.Plot: Two strangers find themselves linked in a bizarre way. When a connection forms, will distance be the only thing to keep them apart?

Seasons.Title: Dangal
Seasons.Actors: Aamir Khan,Sakshi Tanwar,Fatima Sana Shaikh,Sanya Malhotra
Seasons.Plot: Former wrestler Mahavir Singh Phogat and his two wrestler daughters struggle towards glory at the Commonwealth Games in the face of societal oppression.

Seasons.Title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
Seasons.Plot: Teen Miles Morales becomes the Spider-Man of his universe, and must join with five spider-powered individuals from other dimensions to stop a threat for all realities.

Seasons.Title: Avengers: Endgame
Seasons.Actors: Joe Russo,Robert Downey Jr.,Chris Evans,Mark Ruffalo
Seasons.Plot: After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War (2018), the universe is in ruins. With the help of remaining allies, the Avengers assemble once more in order to reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance to the universe.

Seasons.Title: Avengers: Infinity War
Seasons.Actors: Joe Russo,Robert Downey Jr.,Chris Hemsworth,Mark Ruffalo
Seasons.Plot: The Avengers and their allies must be willing to sacrifice all in an attempt to defeat the powerful Thanos before his blitz of devastation and ruin puts an end to the universe.

Seasons.Title: Coco
Seasons.Actors: Adrian Molina,Anthony Gonzalez,Gael Garc�a Bernal,Benjamin Bratt
Seasons.Plot: Aspiring musician Miguel, confronted with his family's ancestral ban on music, enters the Land of the Dead to find his great-great-grandfather, a legendary singer.

Seasons.Title: Django Unchained
Seasons.Plot: With the help of a German bounty hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal Mississippi plantation owner.

shows.Plot: A link in their pasts leads an honest cop to a fugitive gang boss, whose cryptic warning spurs the officer on a quest to save Mumbai from cataclysm.

shows.Title: Paatal Lok

Seasons.Title: Jodaeiye Nader az Simin
Seasons.Plot: A married couple are faced with a difficult decision - to improve the life of their child by moving to another country or to stay in Iran and look after a deteriorating parent who has Alzheimer's disease.

Seasons.Title: Incendies
Seasons.Plot: Twins journey to the Middle East to discover their family history and fulfill their mother's last wishes.

Seasons.Plot: A story of love between a mentally-ill father who was wrongly accused of murder and his lovely six years old daughter. The prison would be their home. Based on the 2013 Korean movie 7-beon-bang-ui seon-mul (2013).

Seasons.Title: Babam ve Oglum
Seasons.Plot: The family of a left-wing journalist is torn apart after the military coup of Turkey in 1980.

Seasons.Title: Inglourious Basterds

Seasons.Plot: When their relationship turns sour, a couple undergoes a medical procedure to have each other erased from their memories.

Seasons.Title: Amélie
Seasons.Plot: Amélie is an innocent and naive girl in Paris with her own sense of justice. She decides to help those around her and, along the way, discovers love.

Seasons.Title: Snatch
Seasons.Actors: Jason Statham,Brad Pitt,Benicio Del Toro,Dennis Farina
Seasons.Plot: Unscrupulous boxing promoters, violent bookmakers, a Russian gangster, incompetent amateur robbers and supposedly Jewish jewelers fight to track down a priceless stolen diamond.

Seasons.Title: Requiem for a Dream
Seasons.Plot: The drug-induced utopias of four Coney Island people are shattered when their addictions run deep.

Seasons.Title: American Beauty
Seasons.Plot: A sexually frustrated suburban father has a mid-life crisis after becoming infatuated with his daughter's best friend.

Seasons.Title: Good Will Hunting
Seasons.Plot: Will Hunting, a janitor at M.I.T., has a gift for mathematics, but needs help from a psychologist to find direction in his life.

Seasons.Title: Bacheha-Ye aseman
Seasons.Actors: Mohammad Amir Naji,Amir Farrokh Hashemian,Bahare Seddiqi,Nafise Jafar-Mohammadi
Seasons.Plot: After a boy loses his sister's pair of shoes, he goes on a series of adventures in order to find them. When he can't, he tries a new way to "win" a new pair.

Seasons.Title: Toy Story
Seasons.Plot: A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened and jealous when a new spaceman figure supplants him as top toy in a boy's room.

Seasons.Title: Braveheart
Seasons.Plot: Scottish warrior William Wallace leads his countrymen in a rebellion to free his homeland from the tyranny of King Edward I of England.

Seasons.Title: Reservoir Dogs
Seasons.Plot: When a simple jewelry heist goes horribly wrong, the surviving criminals begin to suspect that one of them is a police informant.

Seasons.Title: Full Metal Jacket
Seasons.Actors: Matthew Modine,R. Lee Ermey,Vincent D'Onofrio,Adam Baldwin
Seasons.Plot: A pragmatic U.S. Marine observes the dehumanizing effects the Vietnam War has on his fellow recruits from their brutal boot camp training to the bloody street fighting in Hue.

Seasons.Title: Idi i smotri
Seasons.Plot: After finding an old rifle, a young boy joins the Soviet resistance movement against ruthless German forces and experiences the horrors of World War II.

Seasons.Title: Aliens

Seasons.Title: A Clockwork Orange

Seasons.Plot: After discovering a mysterious artifact buried beneath the Lunar surface, mankind sets off on a quest to find its origins with help from intelligent supercomputer H.A.L. 9000.

shows.Plot: A down and out cop lands the case of a lifetime when four suspects are nabbed in the assassination attempt of a prime time journalist. The case turns out to be a devious maze where nothing is what it looks like. The pursuit of it leads him to the dark netherworld - the 'Paatal Lok', and to shocking discoveries in the past of the four suspects.

Seasons.Title: Paths of Glory
Seasons.Plot: After refusing to attack an enemy position, a general accuses the soldiers of cowardice and their commanding officer must defend them.

Seasons.Title: Inception

shows.Plot: The adventures of Ragnar Lothbrok, the greatest hero of his age. The series tells the sagas of Ragnar's band of Viking brothers and his family, as he rises to become King of the Viking tribes. As well as being a fearless warrior, Ragnar embodies the Norse traditions of devotion to the gods. Legend has it that he was a direct descendant of Odin, the god of war and warriors.

shows.Title: Good Doctor

Seasons.Title: Seppuku
Seasons.Plot: When a ronin requesting seppuku at a feudal lord's palace is told of the brutal suicide of another ronin who previously visited, he reveals how their pasts are intertwined - and in doing so challenges the clan's integrity.

Seasons.Title: It's a Wonderful Life
Seasons.Plot: An angel is sent from Heaven to help a desperately frustrated businessman by showing him what life would have been like if he had never existed.

shows.Plot: Bored and unhappy as the Lord of Hell, Lucifer Morningstar abandoned his throne and retired to Los Angeles, where he has teamed up with LAPD detective Chloe Decker to take down criminals. But the longer he's away from the underworld, the greater the threat that the worst of humanity could escape.

shows.Title: Flash

Seasons.Title: Paths of Glory
Seasons.Plot: After refusing to attack an enemy position, a general accuses the soldiers of cowardice and their commanding officer must defend them.

Seasons.Title: Rear Window
Seasons.Plot: A wheelchair-bound photographer spies on his neighbors from his apartment window and becomes convinced one of them has committed murder.

Seasons.Title: Sunset Blvd.
Seasons.Actors: William Holden,Gloria Swanson,Erich von Stroheim,Nancy Olson
Seasons.Plot: A screenwriter develops a dangerous relationship with a faded film star determined to make a triumphant return.

Seasons.Title: The Great Dictator
Seasons.Plot: Dictator Adenoid Hynkel tries to expand his empire while a poor Jewish barber tries to avoid persecution from Hynkel's regime.

April 6th, 1917. As a regiment assembles to wage war deep in enemy territory, two soldiers are assigned to race against time and deliver a message that will stop 1,600 men from walking straight into a deadly trap.

Seasons.Title: Tumbbad
Seasons.Plot: A mythological story about a goddess who created the entire universe. The plot revolves around the consequences when humans build a temple for her first-born.

Seasons.Title: Andhadhun
Seasons.Plot: A series of mysterious events change the life of a blind pianist, who must now report a crime that he should technically know nothing of.

Seasons.Title: Drishyam
Seasons.Plot: A man goes to extreme lengths to save his family from punishment after the family commits an accidental crime.

Seasons.Title: Incendies
Seasons.Plot: Twins journey to the Middle East to discover their family history and fulfill their mother's last wishes.

Seasons.Title: Miracle in cell NO.7
Seasons.Actors: Aras Bulut Iynemli,Nisa Sofiya Aksongur,Deniz Baysal,Celile Toyon Uysal
Seasons.Plot: A story of love between a mentally-ill father who was wrongly accused of murder and his lovely six years old daughter. The prison would be their home. Based on the 2013 Korean movie 7-beon-bang-ui seon-mul (2013).

Seasons.Title: Babam ve Oglum
Seasons.Plot: The family of a left-wing journalist is torn apart after the military coup of Turkey in 1980.

Seasons.Title: Inglourious Basterds
Seasons.Plot: In Nazi-occupied France during World War II, a plan to assassinate Nazi leaders by a group of Jewish U.S. soldiers coincides with a theatre owner's vengeful plans for the same.

Seasons.Title: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
Seasons.Actors: Jim Carrey,Kate Winslet,Tom Wilkinson,Gerry Robert Byrne
Seasons.Plot: When their relationship turns sour, a couple undergoes a medical procedure to have each other erased from their memories.

Seasons.Title: Amélie
Seasons.Plot: Amélie is an innocent and naive girl in Paris with her own sense of justice. She decides to help those around her and, along the way, discovers love.

Seasons.Title: The Shawshank Redemption
Seasons.Plot: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

Seasons.Title: The Godfather
Seasons.Plot: An organized crime dynasty's aging patriarch transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

Seasons.Title: The Dark Knight
Seasons.Plot: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.

Seasons.Title: The Godfather: Part II
Seasons.Actors: Al Pacino,Robert De Niro,Robert Duvall,Diane Keaton
Seasons.Plot: The early life and career of Vito Corleone in 1920s New York City is portrayed, while his son, Michael, expands and tightens his grip on the family crime syndicate.

Seasons.Title: 12 Angry Men
Seasons.Actors: Henry Fonda,Lee J. Cobb,Martin Balsam,John Fiedler
Seasons.Plot: A jury holdout attempts to prevent a miscarriage of justice by forcing his colleagues to reconsider the evidence.

Seasons.Title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
Seasons.Plot: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

Seasons.Title: Pulp Fiction
Seasons.Actors: John Travolta,Uma Thurman,Samuel L. Jackson,Bruce Willis
Seasons.Plot: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

Seasons.Title: Schindler's List
Seasons.Plot: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.

Seasons.Title: Inception
Seasons.Plot: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O.

shows.Plot: After being struck by lightning, CSI investigator Barry Allen awakens from a nine-month coma to discover he has been granted the gift of super speed. Teaming up with S.T.A.R. Labs, Barry takes on the persona of The Flash, the Fastest Man Alive, to protect his city.
